Title: Prohibits the use of timeout boxes, closets or other secluded physical enclosures in schools in the state
Summary: Prohibits the use of timeout boxes, closets or other secluded physical enclosures for children in schools in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the use of timeout boxes, closets or other secluded physical enclosures in schools in the state
